sense.def:
Ultimately
pomeni na koncu, po dolgem nizu dogodkov.

seg.quote: Elections ultimately produced a Communist victory.

sense.def:
Z izrazom
ultimately
tudi poudarimo, da je tisto, o čemer govorimo, najpomembnejša stvar v razpravi.

seg.quote: Ultimately, the problems are not scientific but moral.
Isn't it ultimately the fault of the universities?
